summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BIST 100 stock analysis platform. All requested features are working correctly: Login flow, Dashboard stock selection combobox, Candlestick chart loading, Date range selection via chart clicks, Analysis page with peak/trough markers, Summary statistics, and Similar stocks search tabs.

minor.issue: Heavy computation causes slow response (30-60 seconds)
Heavy computation causes slow response (30-60 seconds)

passed_tests: Backend API health check - 200 OK
Login with test2@test.com / test1234 - SUCCESS
Invalid credentials rejection - 401 returned correctly
Protected endpoint authentication - Working
Stock symbols endpoint - Returns 444 symbols alphabetically sorted
Specific symbols present (THYAO, GARAN, AKBNK, EREGL, SISE, TGSAS, DESPC)
Candlestick data endpoint - Returns OHLC data correctly
Different intervals (1d, 1wk) - Working
Stock analysis endpoint - Returns prices, peaks_troughs, summary
Quick stock info endpoint - Returns current price and change
Find similar stocks endpoint - Exists and functional
Find partial match endpoint - Exists and functional
Save analysis endpoint - Working
Get saved analyses endpoint - Working
Frontend login page loads correctly
Dashboard loads with 444 BIST stocks count
Stock selection combobox is searchable
Combobox shows alphabetically sorted symbols
Candlestick chart loads for selected stock
Chart shows current price and change percentage
Date range selection via chart clicks - First click shows 'Başlangıç' marker
Date range selection - Second click shows 'Bitiş' marker
Date range toast notification appears
Analiz Et button navigates to analysis page
Analysis page shows candlestick chart with peak/trough markers
Summary statistics display (En Düşük, En Yüksek, Ortalama, Volatilite, Toplam Getiri)
Dip & Tepe Noktaları section with tabs (Tümü, Tepeler, Dipler)
Tam Kalıp tab for full pattern matching
Devam Eden Kalıp tab for partial pattern matching
Kalıp Başlangıç Oranı slider (20-60%)
Minimum Benzerlik slider (50-100%)
Turkish localization throughout the app
Pinterest coffee-cream theme properly implemented
seed_data_creation: None required - using existing test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features verified working. The similar stocks search endpoints (/api/stocks/find-similar and /api/stocks/find-partial-match) have heavy computation and may take 30-60 seconds to respond. This is expected behavior. The lightweight-charts v5 API uses createSeriesMarkers() for chart markers. Test user test2@test.com / test1234 is available for testing.
